I was born on the 18th of October 1988, in Pretoria of all places. I spent my entire childhood at the same school in Bloemfontein, and then went on to study there as well. It was during my time at university that I met Karin, and realised that I'd met an incredibly special girl.


Karin and I met on a choir camp to Hilton, an romantic setting, perhaps it contributed to the effect she had on me.


I got quite frustrated with studying and after completing my qualification I accepted a job in Cape Town and we started our long distance phase.


After a year of being apart we realised that the distance thing wasn't working and we decided to move closer together. In the end, Karin moved down to Cape Town where we now happily reside.


I can't imagine my life without my partner. One often takes company for granted but the year I spent without her made me realise all the more how perfectly she complements me. I appreciate the sacrifices she's made for us and hope that I can provide her with a life full of happiness and love, as she provides me with one everyday.

Ek is 4 Des 1988 gebore. Ek studeer op die oomblik nog en is besig met my B.Ed Grondslagfase graad deur Unisa.


Ek hou nogals van sing, doen dit al ‘n rukkie lank. Het ‘n hele paar spesiale mense wat ek van jare se koorsang met my saamsleep, en seker die belangrikste persoon van almal is Robert.


Hoekom is ek lief vir Robert? Wel, daar is nie ‘n spesifieke ‘iets’ wat my liefde gewen het nie.


Dit is meer die kombinasie van sy persoonlikheid, humor, sangtalent, ‘looks’ (veral sy rooi wangetjies;)), sy geloof, sy intelligensie en wel, ALLES.


Alles wat hy is en nie is nie maak my lief vir hom. Die ander aspek is natuurlik wie ek is wanneer ek by hom is, en die feit dat hy vir my lief is, ook met alles wat ek is en nie is nie…


Nie dat een van ons is perfek nie, ons weet dit!.Maar, ons ken mekaar se goeie eienskappe en tekortkominge, en vir een of ander rede werk dit maar net uit dat ons PERFEK vir MEKAAR is…


Ek wens hierdie tiepe liefde vir almal op aarde toe. Dit is spesiaal en sal ‘n ewigheid behoue bly. ‘n Mens kry dit nie aldag nie, en juis daarom koester ek elke oomblik daarvan want ek weet hoe geseënd ek is om vir Robert in my lewe te hê.

Karin's ring was a complete surprise. Robert took the risky option of designing and choosing the ring without Karin's knowledge so as to surprise her on a weekend away with a fairytale engagement. It took Robert quite some time to come up with a design that fit perfectly with Karin's personality, but in the end I think she'll agree that he did.


The main feature of the ring is Faith, one of a pair of family diamonds, that will hopefully start a tradition of being passed down through future generations. Faith's sister, Hope, awaits Heinrich, Robert's brother, when he finds the right woman.


Faith is surrounded by a white gold band and complimented by 14 smaller diamonds set in a thin band underneath.


Robert proposed in the winelands surrounding Robertson the day after Karin's birthday and on their two year 'dating' anniversary:

Sondag, die 5de Des 2010, was ons twee jaar saam. 'n Baie spesiale dag. Ons het daardie oggend op die Arabella wynplaas, tussen die perde gaan stap.


Robert het my ingelig dat ons 12 uur op Kranskop moes wees, sodat hy vir my die pragtige uitsig kan wys.


Toe ons by Kranskop aangeland het, het ons bo-op die dek gaan staan. Daar was Enja-musiek wat in die agtergrond gespeel het, en 'n gedekte tafel met wyn en glase.


Ek het dadelik op een van die stoele gaan sit en Robert het by die reeling gaan staan. Hy sê toe dat ek by hom moet gaan staan, en sê: "My Love, I didn't just bring you here for our anniversary". En dis toe ek weet wat hy my gaan vra! Met klomp gevoelens probeer ek uitwerk hoe ek moet reageer.


Hy gaan toe op sy een knie, en vra my of ek nie asseblief sy vrou sal word nie. Ek het dadelik op sy knie gaan sit en hom gesoen soos nog nooit van tevore nie! En natuurlik was my antwoord: "Ja!"


Ons het gelag, gehuil, foto's geneem en vir 'n paar uur net die oomblik vir so lank as moontlik uitgerek en geniet.g later weer. Ons het toe so 3 ure net op die wynplaas gebly, fotos geneem en net die oomblik so lank as moontlik uitgerek en geniet.

The wedding will take place on the 28th of April 2012 at the Valverde Country Hotel. The couple will be married in a chapel overlooking Elandsvallei by Shaun Darker, who they met in Bloemfontein. The reception and ceremony will both take place on the premises.

Robert will have four groomsmen, his best man Louis, his brother Heinrich, Karin’s brother Mike and his cousin James.

Karin's bridesmaids will be led by her maid of honour, Susan, and her three cousins on her mom’s side, namely Lizca, Tharine and Annemé.
